text: Ia dagher kuraghriba bagh ingar da inian markɨ. Ia dagher zurara ikia mamaghɨra itim bagh ingarɨva a inigh, kar dagher zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim anɨdim. Afeziam God kamaghɨn ian aka, Gumazibar Otarim, a uabɨn torogha gavgavim a ganɨngi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, dagher kam, Gumazibar Otarim a ia danɨngam.”
